description: FLOOP >>> Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. For each Spell discarded this way, target player discards a card.

name: Slay Rider
description: FLOOP >>> Deal 3 Damage to target Creature on a Landscape with a Frozen token on it.

name: Smoldering Elder
description: When Smoldering Elder enters play, each player discards 2 cards.

name: Snake Eye Ring
description: Return a random Useless Swamp Creature from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Snake Eyes
description: Each of your Creatures has +2 ATK this turn while attacking a Creature that is on a Useless Swamp Landscape.

name: Snakemint
description: When Snakemint deals Damage to an opposing player, you heal that many Hit Points. (Cant ' go over 25.)

name: Snow Angel
description: FLOOP >>> Heal 1 Damage from each of your Creatures for each Landscape with a Frozen token on it players control.

name: Snow Baller
description: Remove a Frozen token from Snow Baller's Landscape >>> Deal 3 Damage to target Creature.

name: Snow Bunny
description: Destroy Snow Bunny >>> Freeze target Landscape.

name: Snow Business
description: Pay 1 Action >>> Freeze target Landscape in this Lane.

name: Snow Dog
description: FLOOP >>> Each adjacent Creature has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Snow Training Camp
description: FLOOP >>> Freeze both Landscapes in this Lane. Use only if no Frozen tokens are in play.

name: Snow Way
description: Freeze two target Landscapes.

name: Snowblower
description: Choose a Lane. Freeze both Landscapes in that Lane.

name: Snowvalanche
description: Deal 2 Damage to each opposing Creature on a Landscape with a Frozen token on it.

name: Socks of Fortitude
description: Ready each Creature that changed Lanes this turn. They each have +2 ATK this turn.

name: Spazzy Cola
description: Each Creature in play has +1 ATK this turn (including your opponent's Creatures).

name: Spell Warp
description: Swap the positions of 2 Creatures you control. (They change Lanes simultaneously.)

name: Spike Icicle
description: Look out below!

name: Spirit Tower
description: Pay 1 Action and FLOOP >>> If you control no Creatures in this Lane, move target Creature in this Lane to your side and ready it. At end of turn, return it to its owner's side.

name: Sprucy Lucy
description: Sprucy Lucy has +1 ATK for each Landscape with a Frozen token on it players control.

name: Squatting Bald Man
description: Discard a card >>> Heal 1 Damage from Squatting Bald Man. (Use any number of times during each of your turns.)

name: Static Parrotrooper
description: When Static Parrotrooper enters play, move it to any empty Landscape. It cannot be replaced. At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your Hero.

name: Steakchop
description: At the start of your turn, discard 2 cards or destroy Steakchop. (Discard after your free draw.)

name: Strawberry Slimey
description: If you control 3 or more different Landscape types when Strawberry Slimey enters play, heal 4 Damage from each Creature you control.

name: Strength Crystal
description: Target player draws five cards.

name: Struzann Jinn
description: +2 ATK for each Flooped Creature you control.

name: Subliminal Strength
description: Target Creature you control has +2 ATK this turn for each Spell you played this turn (including this one).

name: Sun King
description: Sun King counts as an additional Cornfield Landscape you control.

name: Sundae School
description: While you have an even amount of Hit Points, your Creature on this Landscape has +2 ATK.

name: Swamp Horn
description: +1 DEF for each different Landscape type you control.

name: TNTimmy
description: When TNTimmy leaves play, deal 1 Damage to each opposing Creature.

name: Tapped Out
description: Target Creature you control has +2 ATK for each exhausted Creature you control (at the time you play this).

name: Tax Reduction
description: You may move each of your Buildings to different Lanes you control. You may move each of your opponent 's Buildings to different Lanes he controls.

name: Teeth Leaf
description: If you have 10 or more cards in your discard pile, pay 2 fewer Actions to play Teeth Leaf.

name: Teleport
description: Move one of your Creatures to one of your empty Lanes.

name: Temple of the Sun
description: When a SandyLands Creature with cost 1 or greater you control enters play in this Lane, you may return it to its owner's hand.

name: The Big Hen House
description: At the start of your turn, deal 1 or 2 Damage to your Creature in this Lane, then you heal 1 HP (Max 25).

name: The Cooler
description: When The Cooler leaves play, Freeze its Landscape.

name: The Mariachi
description: FLOOP >>> Deal 1 Damage to target Creature for each Creature that entered play this turn.

name: The Pig
description: FLOOP >>> Flip target Cornfield Landscape in this Lane face down.

name: The Sludger
description: FLOOP >>> Choose a card name. Remove each card with that name in target player's discard pile from the game.

name: Timmy Magic Eyes
description: Timmy Magic Eyes has +1 ATK while attacking a Creature that is on a Blue Plains Landscape.

name: Tired Wombat
description: At the start of your turn, move Tired Wombat to an empty Landscape you control. If you cannot, move it to an empty Landscape your opponent controls.

name: Toilet of Doom
description: Target Creature you control has +1 ATK this turn for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

name: Tome of Ankhs
description: Draw a card for each of your empty Lanes.

name: Travelin' Farmer
description: When Travelin' Farmer leaves play, deal 1 Damage to your opponent for each card in his hand.

name: Travelin' Skeleton
description: FLOOP >>> Travelin' Skeleton and another Creature you control change Lanes with each other.

name: Travelin' Wizard
description: When Travelin' Wizard enters play, the opposing Creature in this Lane and Travelin' Wizard switch sides.

name: Tree of Undeath
description: FLOOP >>> Return a random Creature from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Unempty Coffin
description: Reduce the cost of the next Creature you play this turn by 2 Actions.

name: Uni-Knight
description: Pay 1 Action >>> Target Creature in this Lane has -10 ATK this turn.

name: Unicyclops
description: At the start of your turn, each player draws a card and then discards a card.

name: Volcano
description: Destroy target Building. You may deal 3 Damage to a Creature in that Lane. Flip your Landscape in that Lane face down.

name: Wake Up Call
description: Ready each Creature you control.

name: Wall of Chocolate
description: While Wall of Chocolate has no Damage on it, it has +3 ATK.

name: Wall of Ears
description: +1 DEF for each Cornfield Landscape in play (counting all players).

name: Wall of Sand
description: If one or more other SandyLands Creatures enter play during your turn, Wall of Sand has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Wandering Bald Man
description: At the start of your turn, put the top card of your deck into your discard pile.

name: Weakened Warrior
description: Weakened Warrior comes into play exhausted and does not ready at the start of your turn. Whenever Weakened Warrior changes Lanes, ready it.

name: Weary Trading Post
description: FLOOP >> Move an exhausted Creature you control to this Landscape (if empty).

name: Well-Dressed Wolf
description: Well-Dressed Wolf has +1 ATK while attacking a Creature that is on a Cornfield Landscape.

name: Windmill of Health
description: While your Creature in this Lane has no Damage on it, it has +2 ATK.

name: Witch Slap
description: Target opponent discards down to 5 cards, and then takes 1 Damage for each card discarded this way.

name: Witch Way
description: Each of your Creature that is on a Useless Swamp Landscape has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Woad Blood
description: Each Creature that changed Lanes this turn has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Woad Mobile Home
description: FLOOP >>> Move a Creature in an empty adjacent Lane to this Lane (if empty).

name: Woad Talisman
description: Target Blue Plains Creature you control has +2 ATK this run.

name: Woadic Chief
description: Woadic Chief has +2 ATK this turn for each Spell you have played this turn.

name: Woadic Marauder
description: When Woadic Marauder changes Lanes during a turn, draw a card.

name: Woadic Ring Leader
description: At the start of your turn, move Woadic Ring Leader to an empty Landscape you control. If you cannot, destroy it.

name: X-Large Spirit Soldier
description: Each adjacent Creature has +1 ATK.

name: Yellow Gnome
description: FLOOP >>> Deal 1 Damage to each opposing Creature that is on a NiceLands Landscape.

name: Yellow Lighthouse
description: At the start of your turn, each players who controls a Creature in this Lane draws a card.

name: Yellow Slimey
description: While you control 3 or more different Landscape types, Yellow Slimey has +3 ATK.

name: ZaZo's Magic Seeds
description: Target SandyLands Creature has +2 ATK this turn for each Creature that entered play into an adjacent Lane this turn.

name: Corns Templar
description: FLOOP >>> Heal 1 Damage from Corns Templar.

name: Sharp Guy
description: FLOOP >>> Deal 2 Damage to target opposing Creature in this Lane.

name: Kernel Queen
description: Kernel Queen has +1 ATK for each Flooped Creature you control.

name: Lumbercaddy
description: FLOOP >>> Move target Building you control to any Landscape without one.

name: Husker Champion
description: Husker Champion has +2 ATK and +2 DEF if you control a Building on this Landscape.

name: Druid of the Cob
description: Flooped Creatures you control have +1 ATK.

name: Popcorn Butteredfly
description: FLOOP >>> Draw a card for each Building you control.

name: Helping Hand
description: FLOOP >>> Return a Building from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Burly Lumberjack
description: You may play additional Buildings onto this Landscape.

name: Husker Valkyrie
description: Husker Valkyrie has +2 ATK and +2 DEF if you control a Building on this Landscape.

name: Tough Lumberjill
description: When Tough Lumberjill enters play, deal 1 Damage to your opponent for each Building you control.

name: Friendship Bracelet
description: Swap any amount of Damage between two Creatures you control.

name: Singing Sword
description: Target Creature has +1 ATK this turn for every 2 cards you have drawn this turn.

name: Sword Bouquet
description: Deal 1 Damage to target Creature for every card you have drawn this turn.

name: Glorious Gramophone
description: Draw 4 cards, then discard 2 cards.

name: Vampire Lord
description: When Vampire Lord deals damage, heal that much Damage from him.

name: Emboldened Retriever
description: Each time Eboldened Retriever attacks, you may deaw a card. Much ball. Wow.

name: Crazy Cat Lady
description: Rainbow Creatures you control have +1 ATK.

name: Impossible Possum
description: When this card is placed into your discard pile from anywhere, you may discard a card from your hand to return Impossible Possum to your hand.

name: Woadic Enchantress
description: Creatures in this Lane cannot use Floop abilities.

name: Void Thimble
description: Lose 2 Hit Points, gain 1 Action.

name: Furious Furor
description: Target Creature has +2 ATK this turn for each Flooped Creature you control.

name: Harvest Moon
description: Put a Building from your discard pile into play.

name: Archer Danica
description: Destroy a Building you control and Floop >>> Deal 3 damage to each opposing Creature.

name: Pied Piper
description: When Pied Piper attacks an opposing Creature, you may have a Flooped Creature you control attack it instead.

name: Tornado Wall Of Fire
description: FLOOP >>> Tornado Wall of Fire has +3 ATK while Flooped.

name: Loonely Panda
description: When Lonely Panda enters play, if you control no other Creatures, draw a card.

name: Infant Scholar
description: If you played one or more Rainbow cards this turn, Infant Scholar has +3 ATK this turn.

name: Tiny Elephant
description: While in play, Tiny Elephant is also a Rainbow Creature (in addition to Blue Plains).

name: Psionic Swashbuckler
description: When Psionic Swashbuckler enters play, you may deal 3 Damage to target Flooped Creature

name: Business Dog
description: Business Dog has +2 ATK this turn for each card you have played "Dog" or "Puppy" in its tile this turn.

name: Fiddling Ferret
description: FLOOP >>> Draw a card, and then discard a card. If you discard a Rainbow card this way, gain 1 Action.

name: The Dog
description: FLOOP >>> Opposing Buildings in this Lane are blank while The Dog is Flooped "Woof."

name: Celestial Fortress
description: The opposing Creature in this Lane has -2 DEF.

name: Blood Castle
description: Each time an opposing Creature in this Lane takes Damage, increase the amount by 1.

name: Farmhouse
description: Farmhouse counts as an additional Cornfield Landscape you control.

name: Fionna
description: While you control only one Landscape type, your Rainbow Creatures have +1 ATK.

name: Cake
description: Each time a Building enters play under your control, heal 2 Damage from each Creature you control with a Building on its Landscape.
